name: underhaul
title: Underhaul
author: el_uncle
description:
Re-balances recipes, technologies and ratios for a faster and smoother playthrough. Lessens the difficulty spikes of mid-game and end-game (but doesn't remove them!).
Most overhaul mods add complexity, this one reduces it: an UNDERHAUL

If you like Factorio but you ain't got time for the grinding, this mod is for you!
